responses: Hi. How can I help you?
Hello. How may I assist you today?
Hi there, how can I help?
Hi. What can I help you with?
Hi, this is etisalat customer support

patterns: I would like to top up
I want to top up credit
I want to check my balance
responses: To top up or check your balace, you can use the Etisalat app that you can download from the app store or play store

patterns: It was nice talking to you
responses: Farewell. It was nice talking to you

patterns: Do you have a shop in New Cairo?
Do you have a shop in New Cairo?
Where can I find your stores?
Where are you located in New Cairo?
responses: Our Etisalat (H.Q), is located at S4, Down Town, 90th Street, New Cairo

patterns: Are you open on public holidays?
From what time to what time is your store open?
What are the hours of operation?
responses: We are open 8am-5pm Sunday-Thursday, except on public holidays
You're welcome. Please let me know if there's anything else you need.
No problem. Let me know if there is anything else I can help you with.

patterns: How can I unsubscribe from any premium rate service messages?
How can I unsubscribe from marketing messages?
How do I block annoying promotional messages?
I don't want any marketing messages
Please stop sending me promotional messages
responses: To unsubscribe from promotional/marketing messages, kindly dial *456*9*5# on your mobile phone. Select <Stop Promotional Messages>, enter the Sender NAME you wish to STOP and press Send. You will then be unsubscribed from receiving further promotional messages from the sender.
